briefTitle: Pain Phenotyping of Patients With Bone Cancer Pain
officialTitle: Pain Phenotyping of Patients With Bone Cancer Pain
conditions: Pain, Bone Metastases, Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Conditioned pain modulation (CPM) determined by cuff pressure algometry
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Woman
* Primary breast cancer
* Bone metastases
* Competent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not fluent in spoken Danish
* Chemotherapy or radiation within the last 3 months
* Other chronic pain disease that may affect the quantitative sensory testing or conditioned pain modulation
* Alcohol or medicine abuse
* Pregnancy
